'''Surf, Turf, and Perch''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Surf, Turf, and Perch can be obtained from an [[Chest|Exquisite Chest]] from a [[Time Trial Challenge]] in [[Ochkanatlan]].

Depending on quality, Surf, Turf, and Perch decreases [[Stamina]] depleted by gliding and sprinting for all party members by '''15-25%''' for 900 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Chasca|Moment of Respite}}
